entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is the one passing the L's to the students. She is in charge of the sorting ceremony.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is a student who is participating in the sorting ceremony and seems to be hungry.

entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: Nearly Headless Nick is a ghost who is watching over the students during the sorting ceremony and seems to be interested in their performance.

entities.name: madley
entities.description: Madley is a student who becomes a Hufflepuff.

entities.name: natalie mcdonald
entities.description: Natalie McDonald is a student who joins the Gryffindor table.
